scripts.hooks:install: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p='.git/hooks/pre-commit';fs.mkdirSync('.git/hooks',{recursive:true});fs.writeFileSync(p,'#!/bin/sh\\nnode scripts/scan-secrets.js \\n$(git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM)\\n[ $? -ne 0 ] && echo \"Secret scan failed\" && exit 1 || exit 0');fs.chmodSync(p,0o755);console.log('pre-commit hook installed')"
